artist: Artist: R. Crumb , et al.; Printer: Highland Press, Athol, Mass.; Publisher: Everett Rand , Lewisburg, W. Va.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical image of cats at a dinner table with letterpress text printed in teal and black-and-white offset lithography on coated paper covers; 32 pp.
medium: Teal and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Mineshaft, no. 12
